QuestData.Title: Time Yet Remains
QuestData.Description: I feel refreshed... renewed... but the plague still grips me. Not to worry, I am still eternally grateful that you went to such lengths for me, a complete stranger. If nothing else, you've bought me a few more precious hours not plaguing the world as a hideous undead.$B$BThank you, $c. Please extend my thanks to Tirion as well, and let him know that it has been an honor to serve beside him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Highlord Tirion Fordring at Crusaders' Pinnacle with news of Emerald Acorn's effects.
QuestData.RewardText: It saddens me to hear that it did not work. No reason to fret though, I have met other beings of good that may still be of aid to us.
